text: , also called , was a politician and bureaucrat. He worked for the Ryukyu Kingdom. Chōshō was born to an aristocrat family. His family was the Shō-uji Urasoe Dunchi (). Chōshō was selected as part of the Sanshikan in 1872. Chōshō was good at waka and Han learning. ==References== *浦添朝昭∥ウラゾエ チョウショウ *廃藩当時の人物 Category:1825 births Category:1883 deaths Category:19th-century Ryukyuan people
title: Urasoe Chōshō
